name: Spider Tinder: One Night Strand
description:
Welcome to Spinder! The hottest app for Spiders looking for love

-Set up your profile

-Swipe right or left

-Chat up single spiders

-Abstracted safe-for-work spider sex!

But watch out, the brands are here to get in the way of your Spider love journey!

A Game by: Leonardo Price, Sam Gould, Kirsten Pilla, Tony Wang, Zack Schwartz
